solution_line_template: Tina made postcards for {num_days} days, so she has made {num_days} days * {postcards_per_day} postcards/day = <<{num_days}*{postcards_per_day}={total_postcards}>>{total_postcards} postcards.

For every postcard, Tina gets ${money_per_postcard}, so if she sold every card, she got {total_postcards} postcards * ${money_per_postcard}/postcard = $<<{total_postcards}*{money_per_postcard}={total_money}>>{total_money}.
